Author: Achilles Tatius
Title: Leucippe and Clitophon
Paragraph: On arriving there after a severe storm, I went to make my votive offerings for my safe arrival to the Phoeniciansâ€™ goddess; Astarte the people of Sidon call her: as I was thus walking about the city, paying especial attention to the temple-offerings, I saw a picture hanging up which was a landscape and a seascape
